title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 3 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 3 2022
description:
Buck's deep dive into Tuesday's election results, including why he and Clay want Michigan's Whitmer out. Stephen Miller gets it: Republicans must make the case on immigration, inflation, wokeness -- or lose. Kari Lake declares victory in AZ gubernatorial primary. The problem with Kansas' abortion referendum. Buck says, "To get laws passed, to defend as many lives as possible in the womb, it's going to require politics and then understanding of the political rituals." Buck takes calls.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
